devdoc.details: A Diamond facet for managing and executing fee distributions.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

AmountsDistributed(address,uint256,addre.details: Emitted when principal and fee amounts are successfully distributed.

params.adjustedAmountReceiver: The address that received the adjusted principal amount (same as principalAmountReceiver).
params.feeReceivers: The addresses that received the fee amounts.
params.principalAmount: The original principal amount before fee deduction.
params.principalAmountReceiver: The address that received the adjusted principal amount.

FeeDistributorInitialized(address,uint25.details: Emitted when the Fee Distributor is initialized.

params.distributionToken: The address of the ERC20 token set for distribution.
params.totalWeightBasis: The basis used for calculating fee weights (e.g., 10000).

FeeReceiversSet(address[],uint256[]).details: Emitted when the fee receivers and weights are updated.

params.feeReceivers: The new array of fee receiver addresses.
params.feeWeights: The new array of corresponding fee weights.

calculateAmounts(uint256).details: This function is view-only and does not perform any state changes or transfers.

params.principalAmount: The total amount before fee deduction.

returns.adjustedAmount: The principal amount remaining after deducting total fees.
returns.feeAmounts: Array of individual fee amounts calculated for each receiver.

distributeAmounts(address,uint256).details: Requires the contract to hold sufficient funds (e.g., USDC) or allowance to perform the transfers.

params._principalAmount: The total amount to be distributed.
params.principalAmountReceiver: The address to receive the adjusted principal amount.

returns.adjustedAmountReceiver: The address that received the adjusted principal amount.
returns.feeReceivers: The addresses that received the fee amounts.
Array of addresses currently set to receive fees.
returns.feeWeights: Array of weights corresponding to each receiver.

initializeFeeDistributor(address,uint256.details: Should only be called once, typically during deployment. Only callable by the contract owner.

params._distributionToken: Address of the ERC20 token to be distributed (e.g., USDC). Cannot be address(0).
params._totalWeightBasis: The basis for fee weights (e.g., 10000 for basis points). Must be greater than 0.

setFeeReceivers(address[],uint256[]).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Weights determine the proportion of fees.

params._feeReceivers: Array of addresses to receive fees.
params._feeWeights: Array of weights corresponding to each receiver.

devdoc.title: FeeDistributorFacet

calculateAmounts(uint256).notice: Calculates the adjusted principal amount and individual fee amounts based on the total principal.

distributeAmounts(address,uint256).notice: Distributes a principal amount, sending calculated fees to receivers and the adjusted amount to the principal receiver.

getFeeReceivers().notice: Gets the current fee receivers and their weights.

setFeeReceivers(address[],uint256[]).notice: Sets the addresses that will receive fees and their corresponding weights.
